# TauPy React starter

Minimal Vite + React + TypeScript shell for TauPy WebView.

## Scripts

- `npm install` – install dependencies
- `npm run dev` – start Vite dev server
- `npm run build` – typecheck and build to `dist/`

## Notes

- Keep TauPy dev mode pointed to the Vite dev server (default port `5173`).
- Edit `src/App.tsx` to start customizing the UI.
